fieldUpdates.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Stage__c, "Qualification"), ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Stage__c, "Proposal"), ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Stage__c, "Credit Underwriting"), ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Stage__c, "Final Review"), ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Stage__c, "Approval / Loan Committee"), ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Stage__c, "Processing") ), 'm-loan.dashboard-loan', IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Stage__c, "Doc Prep"), ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Stage__c, "Closing"), ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Stage__c, "Booking & Funding"), ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Stage__c, "Booked"), ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Stage__c, "Complete") ), 'm-loan-post-approval.post-approval-loan-dashboard', 'm-loan.dashboard-loan' ) )
fieldUpdates.name: Loan - Default App

rules.description: Enforces a Loan naming convention. Added for the Commercial Accelerate project.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(LLC_BI__Account__c)), NOT(ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Product__c, '')), OR( NOT(ISBLANK(LLC_BI__Amount__c)), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(LLC_BI__Amount__c)), ISCHANGED(LLC_BI__Amount__c) ) ), $User.No_Workflow__c = False )

rules.description: Sets the Application Date to 'Today' when a loan record is created
